0.Major_Activities1: to achieve the above objective through immediate resources and mobilizing the available resource and people participation. providing servicing by way of repairing defectives computers installed in the district by several offices institutions individual defense offices and personalities. organize mass awareness camps in various schools collages and communities to enhance corporation through computer application for developmental activities in the region.

source_info.purpose: No funds/Grants has been sanctioned in favour of this Institute during the year 2014-15 however the routine activities of the institute were carried out in absence of grants by collecting free from the interested students @ rs 500 per month and absilutely free for orphans/ handicapped students
